ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine runs along the ground at his top speed. he received a garbled message from tha ark, there was to much interference to get a clear signal. If he

To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
Message-ID: <8l1l3u+m848@...>
In-Reply-To: <8l1k7l+v5v3@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 7751
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: cyberwolf4@...

Lunarpine runs along the ground at his top speed. he received a 
garbled message from tha ark, there was to much interference to get a 
clear signal. If he couldn't hear messages then logic dictates that 
neither can they.

"Wing, don't try to be a hero,Keep your distance until I get there." 
His sense of smellmight be more accorate than her areal scans, 
especially if the explosion damaged sensors."Do you see anything from 
your viewpoint?"

(Who's the ranking Maximal at the Ark if Prowl, Kluster, Striker, and 
Brooder are all elsewhere? If noones in charge than I vote 4 
Lunarpine.)

 --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She transforms to owl mode and head skyward.  She heads for the Ark.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > "Urp" I had mine,help yourself if you don't mind scavenging, I'll 
> > clear the training with Prowl, maybe I can get some of the other 
> > Maximals involved. I've been wanting to test Strikers metal."(No 
> pun 
> > intended.) Slowly the wolf rises to his feat, "I haven't eaten 
that 
> > well in a long time. I could get to like this place after all."
> > 
> > Theres a sudden explosion back at the Ark."What the underworld 
was 
> > that?" He starts to run back towards the Autobot ship"Lunarpine 
to 
> > Ark, what happened?" Taking a quick look back he calls back to 
> Shadow 
> > Wing, "Get airborn, I need to know the situation, if you see 
> trouble 
> > stay back, Wait for backup."
> > 
> > His instincts kicked in, immediately he bared his fangs 
> anticipating 
> > danger. A response comes back to him "Ladies and Gentlemen The 
bomb 
> > has left the building."
> > 
> > The Ark was safe again, but the culprit could still be around.
> > 
> >  --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > ::Shadow Wing::
> > > 
> > > She smiled, "Red I think." She stood up and looked at him.
> > > "If you want to sparr, I'll join in.  I can use some new 
> > techneques."
> > > She was glad the he smiled. 
> > > "OK, now, do you want antilope now or later on?"
> > > 
> > > 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, cyberwolf4@p... wrote:
> > > > "Well You don't owe me anything, unless you know if red or 
> white 
> > > > fluid goes with antelope." He smiles at her in a toothy wolf 
> > grin, 
> > > He 
> > > > was glad she used the word friend towards him, it just meant 
> that 
> > > her 
> > > > feelings hadn't changed. 
> > > > 
> > > > "The Maximals need to work together to win this war, I'd like 
> to 
> > > set 
> > > > up some sparring sessions with the other Maximals, you 
> > interested?"
> > > > He was a wolf, inactivity of any kind would drive him insane. 
> He 
> > > > prefered to be fighting, hunting, pushing himself, and his 
> > opponent 
> > > > to thier fullest like he did with Shadow Wing. He also knew 
> that 
> > he 
> > > > had a problem submitting to rage. It nearly cost him a 
friend, 
> > and 
> > > > later on his eyesight. His anger nealy got him into a fight 
> with 
> > > > Ripper back at the Ark. It fealt like a battle was taking 
place 
> > > > inside of him between the wolf and the bot, he didn't know 
> which 
> > > was 
> > > > winning, but he knew it had to stop. There were two possible 
> > > endings, 
> > > > confront it or be deleated by it.
> > > > 
> > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > > > > ::Shadow Wing::
> > > > > 
> > > > > She transformed into bot mode and wrapped her arms around 
> > > > Lunarpine's 
> > > > > neck. She felt his soft fur against her arms and face and 
she 
> > > > gently 
> > > > > hugged him. She smiled and said in a soft voice," Your 
> welcome. 
> > > > > Anything for a good friend like you."  She was just happy 
to 
> be 
> > > > with 
> > > > > him, no matter what, she wanted to be with him. And she 
> wasn't 
> > > > afraid 
> > > > > to admit that to herself any more.
> > > > > "I understand and what you said made sence.  I should be 
more 
> > > > careful 
> > > > > in battle and not try to kill an entire army by myself. 
> > Besides, 
> > > I 
> > > > > got most of the moves from you anyway. Your a good teacher 
> you 
> > > > know. 
> > > > > Despite what you think, you've taught me a lot.  About 
myself 
> > and 
> > > > > about you. Thank you for that."
> > > > > She gave a gently squeeze around his thick wolf neck. She 
was 
> > > just 
> > > > > happy he was alive and thankful to the matrix that he 
wasn't 
> > mad 
> > > at 
> > > > > her.
> > > > > 
> > > > > "If you want, I can get another kill for you.  I figured 
> since 
> > > you 
> > > > > saved my tail feathers a few times, I owed you dinner at 
> least."
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> 
> wrote:
> > > > > > (Sorry I didn't get back sooner)
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > (Responding to all posts)
> > > > > > Lunarpine looked up at Shadow Wing, "No thanks, I've 
> already 
> > > > > eaten," he says
> > > > > > glancing behind a nearby rock where the remains of an 
> > antelope 
> > > > lay, 
> > > > > it'd
> > > > > > been a while since the kill, insects were already takeing 
> > care 
> > > of 
> > > > > the
> > > > > > leftovers.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "I'm glad you found me." he rolled over exposing his 
> > vulnerable 
> > > > > side."Take
> > > > > > your best shot, I deserve it for how I treated you."
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > He paused waiting for her response.
> > > > > > "I didn't mean that you couldn't fight at my side, I just 
> > meant 
> > > > > that there
> > > > > > were other bots needing your help more." He was trying to 
> > > choose 
> > > > > his words
> > > > > > wisely to avoid sticking another paw in his mouth. "I'm a 
> > wolf, 
> > > > my 
> > > > > sense of
> > > > > > smells better than most bots sight. Even if I didn't have 
> my 
> > > > > scanners, multi
> > > > > > vision sensors or any sight at all I'm still a better 
> warrior 
> > > > than 
> > > > > nearly
> > > > > > anyone there.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > He paused again, he didn't want her to know about his 
> > > defect."You 
> > > > > and Prowl
> > > > > > put to much thought on me and put yourself at risk and 
look 
> > > what 
> > > > > happened,
> > > > > > both of you went down protecting me when I could have 
moved 
> > > > better 
> > > > > if I
> > > > > > wasn't worrying about you. A unit needs to know the 
> strengths 
> > > and 
> > > > > weaknesses
> > > > > > of each member, without that their just getting in 
> eachothers 
> > > > way. 
> > > > > We won
> > > > > > the fight, we were lucky."
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > "Oh I almost forgot, thanks for saving me.".
> > > > > > ----- Original Message -----
> > > > > > From: <logomorph@h...>
> > > > > > To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> > > > > > Sent: Monday, July 17, 2000 2:50 PM
> > > > > > Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > > ::Shadow Wing::
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > She nudged the fat crow a little closer to 
> > > Lunarpine.  "Enjoy. 
> > > > > I'll
> > > > > > > catch one for me in a minute.  You eat first."
> > > > > > > She hoped his spirits would pick up a little.
> > > > > > >
